entry.title: 每日总结 7.13
entry.content:
🍔英语

  • hunger for ~（对某事物的）渴望，渴求
    a hunger for knowledge
    对知识的渴求
  • disposable 可动用的；可自由支配的
    disposable income 可支配收入（税后收入）
  • people on high/low incomes
    高／低收入的人
    higher/middle/lower income groups
    较高／中等／较低收入阶层
  • abject*/*extreme poverty 极度贫困
    ~in poverty 处于贫困之中
  • career development
    职业的发展
    a commercial/business/housing development(新建筑)
    商业开发区；新建住宅区
    the latest developments in the war
    战争的最新进展情况(新发展情况，进展状况，发展阶段)
    evelopments in the investigation 调查新进展
  • index ①索引 ②指数（物价和工资）
    Author and subject indexes 作者索引和学科索引
    the cost*-of-*living index
    生活费用指数
  • an emergency measure 紧急措施
    preventive measures 预防措施（to do）
  • Who is in goal？守门员是谁？
    The winning goal was scored by Hill*.*
    希尔踢进了致胜的一球。（射门；进球得分）
    to achieve/attain a goal达到目标
    You need to set yourself some long-term goals.你得为自己定一些长期目标。
    Our ultimate goal must be the preservation of the environment.我们的最终目的必须是保护好环境。
  • There was an air of expectancy among the waiting crowd*.*
    等待的人群心怀期盼。
    a sitting/kneeling/lying position
    坐姿；跪姿；卧姿
    to be in a position of power/strength/authority处于有权力／有实力／有权威的地位
    I’m afraid I am not in a position to help you.我恐怕帮不了你。
  • figure ①数字 ②人物（人影）leadingfigure ③体型；身材
    I’m watching my figure (= trying not to get fat).
    我一直注意保持身材。
  • low-income/one-parent, etc. households
    低收入、单亲等家庭
    the head of the household 户主
  • raising money for charity 筹集救济金
    Do you give much to charity？慈善捐助你捐得多吗？
    to live on/off charity 靠赈济生活
  • inhabitant 居民
  • She bears（显示） a striking similarity to her mother.她跟她母亲十分相像。
  • air/freight/road transport空运；货运；公路运输
    His bike is his only **means（方式，方法，途径） of transport.**自行车是他唯一的代步工具。
  • industrial unrest
    产业工人骚乱
    They had made industrial quantities of food (= a lot)*.*他们生产了大量的食品。
    industrial nations 工业国
  • smart ①整洁（人，衣服） ②聪明
    That was a smart career move.那是个人事业发展上的一着妙棋。
  • in vast numbers 大批出现
    In the vast majority of cases*,*
    在绝大多数情况下
  • There will be live entertainment at the party.联欢会上将有现场表演节目。entertainment value 娱乐价值
  • an exchange of glances/insults（侮辱，辱骂）互换眼色；相互侮辱
    an exchange of fire (= between enemy soldiers)交火
    Is that a fair exchange?
    这算是公平交易吧
    in exchange for 用什么交易什么
    Would you like my old TV in exchange for this camera*?*
    I’ll type your report if you’ll babysit in exchange.如果你愿意代我照看孩子，我就把这个报告给你打出来。（句尾）
  • natural disaster 自然灾害
    Disaster struck when the wheel came off.车轮脱落，灾难就来了。
    His plans are a recipe for disaster.他的计划后患无穷。
    Letting her organize the party is a recipe for disaster (= something that is likely to gobadly wrong)*.*让她来组织这次聚会非坏事不可。
  • ①The river is in flood (= has more water in it than normal and has caused a flood)*.河水泛滥。
    ②a flood of complaints大量投诉
    The child was in floods of tears (= crying a lot)    .*小孩哭得泪人儿似的。
  • thunder and lightning 电闪雷鸣
    He was struck（攻击） by lightning and killed*.他被闪电击中而死。
    Lightning strikes caused scores of fires across the state    .*雷击给整个州造成了多起火灾。
  • column/ˈkɒləm/①柱状体
    ②书、报纸等印刷页上的）栏
    a column of text一栏正文
    ③报刊的）专栏，栏目
    the gossip*/*financial column漫谈／财经专栏
    ④纵行（数字或字）
    column of figures 纵行数字

entry.title: 博客配置总结
每日总结 7.12
entry.content:
🚎英语

  • channel ①海峡②（交流的）途径通道
    **through the proper channels通过正当的渠道 **
    channel of communication交流渠道

  • argue ①争论 ②辩论
    ~argue the point 讨论问题
    It could be argued that~

entry.title: 每日总结 7.7
entry.content:
🛫英语

  • Is your mother still alive？你母亲还建在吗？
    bury alive 活埋

entry.title: 每日总结 7.6
entry.content:
✅英语

  • take drug 吸毒
    on drug 吸毒成瘾(= regularly used drugs)

entry.title: 每日总结 7.5
entry.content:
🚗英语

  • with every passing day 一天天过去

  • go by （时间）流逝

  • at a disadvantage 处于不利地位
    put him at a distinct disadvantage 使他处于明显的不利地位
    be to my disadvantage ~会使我吃亏
    outweight the disadvantage 超过了缺点
    main/major disadvantage 主要缺点

  • fighting fit 十分健康，精力充沛
    fit for a king (=very good quality)啥啥东西很好
    in on fit state （在一种不合适的状态）

  • anxious 焦虑的 丨 渴望的
    anxious about ,for,that,to do sth，…

  • to sustain injuries /an injury 受伤
    serious injury ↔minor injury 重伤↔轻伤
    no injuries 没有伤员
    do yourself an injury=hurt yourself 弄伤自己

  • in pain
    pain relief =relieve the pain 减轻痛苦
    Is your back still painful？你的背还疼吗？

  • under normal circumstances，在一般情况下
    in the normal course of events，通常来说。
    lead a normal life过正常的生活

  • lavish lifestyle 挥霍无度的生活方式

  • Where are we heading？我们要往那里去？
    lets head back home . 咱们回家吧。
    Where are you two headed？你们两个要去哪？

  • bad breath 口臭
    short of breath 呼吸困难

  • Oh that’s awful. 哦，那真不像话。 awful→很坏的；极讨厌的
    its awful，isn’t it？ 糟透了，不是吗？
    to look/feel awful (= to look/feel ill)
    面带病容；感到很不舒服
    its going to cost ==an awful lot of== money. 这将要花费非常多的钱。 awful→非常多的
    ==a lot of ↔ lots of==

    There’s not ==an awful lot== of room.没有很多的空间。
    I feel ==an awful lot== better than I did yesterday.我觉得身体比昨天好得多了。

  • insurance cover 保险保障
    take sth ↔ out （通过申请）办理；取得（正式文件或服务）
    to take out insurance against fire and theft. 办理火险和盗窃服务。
    insurance premiums 保险费

    premium /ˈpriːmiəm/ 保险费

  • The two issues are closely connected.

entry.title: 每日总结 7.4 待更新
entry.content:
⛵英语

  • gain access 获得许可

  • concentrate on（sth/doing sth )集中注意做~
    concentrate on sth /concentrate on doing sth . such as ‘concentrate the mind,concentrate efforts on ~’集中注意力，竭尽全力‘

  • by permission of 通过~的许可
    (without)permission (for)(to do)

  • design (sth)(for sth/sb)(为)设计 ~
    design as sth 作为    而设计 eg. This course is primarily designed as an introduction to the subject.
    design可以表示设计，创作，某种特定的目的（小组设计，学生设计）

  • percentage（of）~的百分比
    percentage point 百分点 丨 express as a percentage 用百分率来表示 丨 in percentage term 用百分比来表示

entry.title: 每日总结 7.3
entry.content:
⚓英语

  • in substance 基本上来说，大体来说
  • a stage they go though （）总要经历的时期
    at one stage 有一段时期
  • stage by stage 一步步（逐步）
    in stages 分布进行
    march off the stage 离开舞台
  • come/lead to the conclusion 得出结论 or (draw/make/reach the ~)
  • soil adj. (dry) 烧（干）
  • in the ordinary course of event 在一般情况下
